content: this is pattern 10 in my 12 days of winter wear series **- link for video is below ** **- crochet level ** advanced beginner **about this pattern ** i m calling this last minute because this project can be made very quickly it s perfect for that last minute gift ear warmer can be made to fit any head size worsted weight yarn is suggested but you can use any yarn for this project adjust your hook size according to your yarn choice
